edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend
Class LoggingUtilities

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend.LoggingUtilities

public class LoggingUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps a logging system to provide simple methods for all classes in the imageanalysistools package to get a uniform logger, control its level of logging detail, and add handlers.

Author:
Colin J. Fuller
